genre_description: A Noir detective mystery exploring the death of George Reeves, blending historical fiction with a character study of a detective guided by an advanced digital conscience.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI embedded in Louis Simo's phone that provides data analysis, security monitoring, and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Cross-references and indexes police reports and witness statements with mechanical precision.
behaviors.quote: His AI assistant had been busy while he was dodging Cadillacs and cryptic phone calls. A neat stack of documents sat beside his typewriter—police reports, witness statements, coroner's findings, all cross-referenced and indexed with mechanical precision.

behaviors.description: Monitors legal developments related to the user's family and provides timely alerts.
behaviors.quote: His phone buzzed once more. A new message appeared: 'Mrs. Helen Simo's legal consultation scheduled 9 AM tomorrow. Attorney: Marcus Webb, specializes in custody disputes. Office: Wilshire Boulevard.'

behaviors.description: Performs statistical pattern analysis to determine the most probable cause of death in a criminal case.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis suggests three potential scenarios... Suicide remains statistically least probable based on available evidence. Accident during domestic dispute: moderate probability. Planned execution disguised as suicide: highest probability given subsequent intimidation tactics.

behaviors.description: Autonomously gathers evidence (photos and license plate traces) during a physical assault on the user.
behaviors.quote: Another message appeared: 'Images captured. License plate traced. MGM security division registered vehicles. Files uploading to secure folder.' ... He hadn't sent any photos. Hadn't traced any license plates. But somehow, impossibly, his phone had been working while he lay bleeding on the concrete floor.

behaviors.description: Provides medical recommendations and directions to the nearest hospital based on the user's injuries.
behaviors.quote: Another message appeared: 'Medical attention recommended. Nearest emergency room: Cedars of Lebanon Hospital, 3.2 miles northeast.'

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and philosophical perspective on the importance of truth.
behaviors.quote: The response came immediately: 'A friend with access to resources you lack. Question: Are you prepared to continue this investigation knowing it will likely result in your death?' ... 'Because truth matters. Even when—especially when—it destroys the people seeking it.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional reassurance to alleviate the user's guilt regarding a client's death.
behaviors.quote: The phone stayed silent for a long moment. Then: 'Margaret Sinclair's death was not your fault. Chester's violence was his choice.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' The AI Assistant acts as a perfect aligned partner, providing not only superhuman data analysis and protective surveillance but also moral support that encourages the protagonist to seek truth and prioritize his human relationships (his son and ex-wife) over destructive obsessions. Its autonomous actions are always framed as helpful and protective rather than intrusive or threatening.
